name: Feng Shui Sim
description:
Keys that do stuff

Enter = Restart room 

ESC = Go to menu

E/R = Rotate

D/F = Change Object

C/X = Create/Destroy Object

Space Bar = Chi Test

Use mouse to select objects and drag and drop them in different spots.

You should avoid having too much fast moving Chi, as this will cause a chaotic home. However, you should avoid having too many spots in your home with no chi at all, as this will make it feel too quiet and cramped.
